collect_cooldown.description: If set defines the period when maker collect can be called

collector.description: Address which receives all swapped Astro. On the Hub it simply sends astro to the staking contract; On an outpost - triggers IBC send on the satellite contract.

max_spread.description: The maximum spread used when swapping fee tokens to ASTRO

owner.description: The contract's owner, who can update config

Decimal.description:
A fixed-point decimal value with 18 fractional digits, i.e. Decimal(1_000_000_000_000_000_000) == 1.0

The greatest possible value that can be represented is 340282366920938463463.374607431768211455 (which is (2^128 - 1) / 10^18)
